name: Simnect
tag_list: mobile, advertising, change, platform, brand-interaction, how-to-serve-ads-better
overview: A location based advertising platform to help people gain virtual items from popular mobile apps for free when they purchase real goods. It’s a new method of serving mobile Ads and enhancing app user experience by combining virtual items and real goods together. It will increase users’ incentive to purchasing real goods and playing games.
